title: China Yangtze River Urban Hideaway with Three Exceptional Restaurants
description: You're not far from the mighty Yangtze River - the longest river in Eurasia - when you stay at Crowne Plaza Yibin, an IHG Hotel. The hotel boasts three exceptional restaurants: try mouthwatering Sanjiang fare, served buffet style; feast on sizzling teppanyaki; or enjoy high-end Chinese cuisine in an upscale restaurant setting. When you're not treating your tastebuds, enjoy moments of leisure in the heated indoor swimming pool, or ascend to the seventh floor to the first-class fitness centre.
offer_address: No. 10 Mu Lin Road, Xu Zhou Area, Yibin, Sichuan 644002, China
